  • Method Details

    • InputTo2DArray

      public int[][] InputTo2DArray(String userInput)
      Converts String user input into a 2D array containing source and destination floors.
      Parameters:
      userInput - The input string in the format "src:dest,src:dest,src:dest..."
      Returns:
      A 2D array representing source and destination floors

    • isValidSrcDestFormat

      public boolean isValidSrcDestFormat(String[] input)
      Checks if the given input array has the expected src:dest format.
      Parameters:
      input - The job request array "src:dest" to validate
      Returns:
      True if the input array has a length of 2; otherwise, false

    • getSrcFloor

      public int getSrcFloor(String[] input)
      Converts the first element of the input array into an integer, representing the source floor.
      Parameters:
      input - An array in the expected src:dest format, where the source floor is the first element
      Returns:
      The integer value of the source floor

    • getDestFloor

      public int getDestFloor(String[] input)
      Converts the second element of the input array into an integer, representing the destination floor.
      Parameters:
      input - An array in the expected src:dest format, where the destination floor is the second element
      Returns:
      The integer value of the destination floor

    • isValidRequest

      public boolean isValidRequest(String input)
      Validates the input request for an elevator trip: Checks if: the input format is correct, the floors are within the given range, the floors are different
      Parameters:
      input - The input string representing the trip request in "src:dest" format
      Returns:
      True if the request is valid; otherwise, false

    • resizeArray

      public int[][] resizeArray(int[][] jobs, int validRequestCounter)
      Resizes the given 2D array of jobs based on the valid request counter.
      Parameters:
      jobs - The initial 2D array of jobs
      validRequestCounter - The counter for valid, non-null requests
      Returns:
      A resized 2D array containing only valid job requests

    • validateTrip

      public void validateTrip(int src, int dest) throws InvalidInputException
      Validates the trip based on source and destination floors.
      Parameters:
      src - The source floor.
      dest - The destination floor.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - Thrown when the input doesn't meet validation criteria.

    • floorInRange

      public boolean floorInRange(int floor)
      Checks if the given floor is within the valid building range.
      Parameters:
      floor - The floor number to check
      Returns:
      True if the floor is within the building range, otherwise false

    • sameFloor

      public boolean sameFloor(int src, int dest)
      Checks if the source and destination floors are different.
      Parameters:
      src - The source floor
      dest - The destination floor
      Returns:
      True if the floors are different, otherwise false
